document_data.name: Bryvill Trueshot
document_data.mainbody: '''Bryvill Trueshot''' was an [[elf]] [[ranger]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: Bryvill had long blonde hair and light skin. She wore green leafy clothing including a [[tunic]], [[breeches]], and [[archer's hat]], and had a huge [[copper]] [[bow]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Bryvill joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|fortified camp]] outside the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. She provided training and guidance to prospective rangers that passed through the camp.
